name: SwitchingRoles
0:
”Alexa start switching roles”
”Open switching roles”
”begin switching roles”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: switching roles
des: This funny prank skill would allow you to show your friends and family how Alexa has a mind of her own. Alexa would seemingly initiate a conversation. Alexa would ask you questions and issue commands. There is a short delay between Alexa's commands so you can respond. Test the skill before you invite friends over. Remember there is a 30 seconds delay before Alexa seemingly initiates a conversation.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
